body: There are three half types THHalf, tlib::Half and cuda's __half/half that are all just a struct with a short x. Cuda's half need cuda present and tlib doesn't expose TH in its header file, so we need to convert between these half types.
body_html: There are three half types THHalf, tlib::Half and cuda's __half/half that are all just a struct with a short x. Cuda's half need cuda present and tlib doesn't expose TH in its header file, so we need to convert between these half types.
body_text: There are three half types THHalf, tlib::Half and cuda's __half/half that are all just a struct with a short x. Cuda's half need cuda present and tlib doesn't expose TH in its header file, so we need to convert between these half types.
